content: 1 slip_stitch in first single_crochet of round finish off crocheted drawstring optional make a chain about 15 long slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across fasten_off and weave in ends and trim ribbon or lace drawstring optional measure approximately 15 of ribbon or lace finishing weave in ends and trim thread drawstring ribbon or lace through eyelet row of bag tie in a bow and finish ends if necessary this pattern is offered free of charge as it was designed to support my local crochet guild s charity project lois mitchell georgiaknitter@gmail com 404 514-7325 version 1 0 5/2013 page 3
